source: TEXT_STMBDA124_02458_SEQ_00<tab>Meffrid understands that you must act quickly to save Wercrata.
target: TEXT_STMBDA124_02458_SEQ_00<tab>Meffrid semble résolu à affronter les bandits qiqirns pour délivrer Wercrata.

source: TEXT_STMBDA124_02458_TODO_00<tab>Search for Wercrata near the Ziggurat.
target: TEXT_STMBDA124_02458_TODO_00<tab>Observer les environs à l'endroit indiqué

source: TEXT_STMBDA124_02458_LYSE_000_001<tab>We're wasting time! Let's go, go, go!
target: TEXT_STMBDA124_02458_LYSE_000_001<tab>Nous devons absolument libérer ce Wercrata des griffes des bandits qiqirns<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_STMBDA124_02458_WISCAR_100_001<tab>(You shouldn't get her hopes up like that. Everyone knows the ratmen <var 1A 02 /var>eat<var 1A 01 /var> their prisoners.)
target: TEXT_STMBDA124_02458_WISCAR_100_001<tab>Si j'étais vous, je laisserais tomber. Les hommes-rats de la Ziggourat ont la réputation de manger les humains quand ils ont rien d'autre à se mettre sous la dent.

source: TEXT_STMBDA124_02458_SHARPEYEDWOMEN_100_003<tab>If this sodding leg of mine was any good, I'd...
target: TEXT_STMBDA124_02458_SHARPEYEDWOMEN_100_003<tab>Si je n'étais pas infirme, je partirais sauver Wercrata avec vous.

source: TEXT_STMBDA124_02458_BEWILDEREDWOMEN_100_004<tab>You've got to hurry! The gods only know what they could be doing to him!
target: TEXT_STMBDA124_02458_BEWILDEREDWOMEN_100_004<tab>Wercrata... J'espère que les Qiqirns ne lui ont pas fait de mal...

source: TEXT_STMBDA124_02458_MEFFRID_000_010<tab>So Wercrata's being held somewhere at the Ziggurat to the south, which has been taken over by a host of Qiqirn bandits. That about covers it, then.
target: TEXT_STMBDA124_02458_MEFFRID_000_010<tab>Ce Wercrata a été emmené à la Ziggourat. C'est au sud-ouest d'ici.

source: TEXT_STMBDA124_02458_MEFFRID_000_011<tab>Be prepared for a fight. They may not be the most challenging foes, but there's sure to be a lot of them.
target: TEXT_STMBDA124_02458_MEFFRID_000_011<tab>Allons-y et donnons une bonne correction aux Qiqirns qui se dresseront sur notre chemin<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_STMBDA124_02458_WERCRATA_000_070<tab>(-???-)Please, let me go! I'm begging you! I don't want to die!
TEXT_STMBDA124_02458_MEFFRID_000_071<tab>Hear that? I think it came from the top of the Ziggurat!
target:
TEXT_STMBDA124_02458_MEFFRID_000_071<tab>Wercrata est en haut de la Ziggourat<var 1D /var>!
Hmm<var 1D /var>?<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_STMBDA124_02458_QIQIRNMEATGNASHER_000_072<tab>Who dares come to loot our man-flesh! Ours to eat! Ours to eat!
target:
TEXT_STMBDA124_02458_QIQIRNMEATGNASHER_000_072<tab>Huuumains venir voler miam miam<var 1D /var>!?
Pas passer<var 1D /var>! Huuumains regretter<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_STMBDA124_02458_MEFFRID_000_073<tab>We knew it'd come to this. Kill them quick, before they alert the others!
target: TEXT_STMBDA124_02458_MEFFRID_000_073<tab>On n'a pas le choix... Il va falloir rentrer dans le tas<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_STMBDA124_02458_LYSE_000_030<tab><pant> <pant> I thought you said they'd be no challenge!
TEXT_STMBDA124_02458_MEFFRID_000_035<tab><pant> <pant> I also said there'd be a bloody host of them!

TEXT_STMBDA124_02458_BALLOON_000_036<tab>Eat your flesh too
for this trespass!
TEXT_STMBDA124_02458_WERCRATA_000_040<tab>By Rhalgr, what did I ever do to deserve this? I've gone to bed hungry for months. I'm skin and bones! I'd hardly make a snack, much less a meal...
target: TEXT_STMBDA124_02458_WERCRATA_000_040<tab>Oh, non<var 1D /var>! Mais que vais-je devenir<var 1D /var>?<var 1D /var>... J'espère seulement que tout ce qu'on dit sur ces hommes-rats n'est pas vrai...
TEXT_STMBDA124_02458_LYSE_000_041<tab>Les Douze soient loués<var 1D /var>! Nous sommes arrivés à temps<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_STMBDA124_02458_LYSE_000_043<tab>Your sister sent us. It's going to be all right.
target: TEXT_STMBDA124_02458_LYSE_000_043<tab>Oui, c'est ta sœur qui nous a demandé de partir à ta rescousse.

source: TEXT_STMBDA124_02458_WERCRATA_000_044<tab>My sister? Oh, Rhalgr be praised, she's safe! And you...you lot fought your way in here just for me? To think there are still good, brave folk in this world...
target: TEXT_STMBDA124_02458_WERCRATA_000_044<tab>Elle a donc réussi à leur échapper<var 1D /var>!? Le Destructeur soit loué, et mille mercis à vous<var 1D /var>! J'ai vraiment cru que ces hommes-rats allaient me dévorer...

source: TEXT_STMBDA124_02458_MEFFRID_000_045<tab>We should go before the Qiqirn return in force. Do you still have the tributum?
target: TEXT_STMBDA124_02458_MEFFRID_000_045<tab>Ne restons pas ici. Les Qiqirns ne tarderont sûrement pas à envoyer des renforts.

source: TEXT_STMBDA124_02458_WERCRATA_000_046<tab>Oh gods, the tributum! The imperials will be wondering where I am! I have to go!
target: TEXT_STMBDA124_02458_WERCRATA_000_046<tab>Ou-oui, vous avez raison... Il faut que je me dépêche d'apporter le tributum de mon village aux Impériaux<var 1D /var>!
TEXT_STMBDA124_02458_LYSE_000_047<tab>Tu veux y aller dans cet état<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_STMBDA124_02458_WERCRATA_000_048<tab>You don't understand─we were given a warning last month for being short! If I don't make it in time, there's no telling what will happen to me and my sister!
target: TEXT_STMBDA124_02458_WERCRATA_000_048<tab>Je n'ai pas le choix, nous ne les avons pas payés le mois dernier. Si j'attends davantage, notre village risque d'en subir les con<var 16 /var>sé<var 16 /var>quen<var 16 /var>ces. En tout cas, laissez-moi vous renouveler ma recon<var 16 /var>nais<var 16 /var>san<var 16 /var>ce, je vous dois la vie<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_STMBDA124_02458_MEFFRID_000_050<tab>Aan like him are barely considered people under imperial rule. They're to work hard and pay their taxes, and if they don't, there'll be seven hells to pay. Beatings, imprisonment, enslavement─and as for your womenfolk, well...
target: TEXT_STMBDA124_02458_MEFFRID_000_050<tab>De ce que je sais, la plupart des habitants des provinces ne sont pas considérés comme des citoyens par les Garlemaldais. Ils sont réduits à une vie de servitude et doivent payer de lourdes taxes. Les jeunes femmes subissent parfois un sort encore moins enviable.

source: TEXT_STMBDA124_02458_LYSE_000_060<tab>I'm glad we saved him, but seeing him run off like that... I've got a bad feeling about this.
target: TEXT_STMBDA124_02458_LYSE_000_060<tab>C'est une chance que nous ayons pu sauver Wercrata, mais ça me révolte qu'il doive se rendre auprès des Impériaux malgré ce qui lui est arrivé...
